Check the video tutorial of practicing Tai Chi online and play the video

```json
[
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Open Browser"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Enter \"video tutorial of practicing tai chi\" as the search keyword in the browser to search"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Select an interesting video to play"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Pause the playing video"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Close Video Page"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Close Browser"}
]
```
Check the video tutorial of practicing Tai Chi online and play the video
Check the video tutorial of practicing Tai Chi online and play the video
Check the video tutorial of practicing Tai Chi online and play the video

According to the status of the existing screen image, we need to enter "video tutorial of practicing tai chi" in the browser as a search keyword to search. To complete this task, we can follow the following steps:
1. Enter "video tutorial of practicing Tai Chi" in the search box as the search keyword.
2. Press the enter key on the keyboard to trigger the click event of the search button.
The following is an action example in JSON format, representing these operations:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "\u7ec3\u592a\u6781\u7684\u89c6\u9891\u6559\u7a0b"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```

Browse an answer in Zhihu

Please refer to the following plan:```json
[
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Double click to open browser"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Enter 'Zhihu URL' in the browser address bar and transfer to"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Enter the question you want to query in the Zhihu search box and search"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Click a question link in the search results"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Browse this answer on the question page"}
]
```
Browse an answer in Zhihu
Browse an answer in Zhihu
Browse an answer in Zhihu

To enter Zhihu's web address in the browser's address bar and enter it, you need to move the mouse pointer to the address bar first, then click to activate the input status, then enter Zhihu's web address, and finally press Enter to confirm. The following are the specific operation steps:
1. Move the mouse to the browser address bar and click to select it.
2. Enter the web address of "Zhihu".
3. Press the Enter key ('Return ') to access the web address.
The following are specific operation instructions in JSON format:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 647, "height": 74}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "www.zhihu.com"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```
Browse an answer in Zhihu
Browse an answer in Zhihu

In this screenshot, I can see a page of Zhihu currently opened in Firefox browser. In order to enter a query question in the Zhihu search box and search, I need to perform the following steps:
1. Click the search box to activate the input status.
2. Type a search term.
3. Press Enter to search.
Now, I will perform the following operations to simulate entering search terms```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 545, "height": 122}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "python"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```

View the results of translating "Hello" into English

```json
[
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Open Firefox browser"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Enter the URL of Deepl translation in the browser address bar"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Enter 'Hello' on the translation page"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Click the drop-down box of the source language"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Set the source language to Chinese"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Click the drop-down box of the target language"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Set the target language to English"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "View translation results"}
]
```
View the results of translating "Hello" into English
View the results of translating "Hello" into English
View the results of translating "Hello" into English

According to the screenshot, Firefox browser has been opened. Our current task is to enter the URL of Deepl translation in the browser address bar.
The following steps are for entering the Deepl translation website:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 500, "height": 70}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "https://www.deepl.com/translator"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```

New Presentation

Based on the screen image provided, it appears you are using a Linux desktop environment with graphical icons that can be clicked to open various applications. To start a new presentation document, you will likely want to use an office suite program such as LibreOffice Impress, which is the presentation software in the LibreOffice suite. Here is a JSON formatted plan that outlines the steps to accomplish your task of "新建演示文档" (create a new presentation document):

```json
[
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Double click the 'LibreOffice Impress' icon to start the presentation program"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Wait for the program to start"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Select 'New Presentation'"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Start creating the contents of the presentation"}
]
```

Please note the actual names of menu items and options may depend on the specific version and language settings of the software.
New Presentation

Given the subtask to "双击 'LibreOffice Impress' 图标启动演示文档制作程序" (double-click the 'LibreOffice Impress' icon to start the presentation document creation program) and the image shown, if I were to provide guidance for a user performing the action, it would be something like this:

1. Move the mouse cursor to the position of the 'LibreOffice Impress' icon on the screen.
2. Double-click the left mouse button to initiate the program.

In json format, the instruction to double-click the 'LibreOffice Impress' icon could look like the following. Note that the exact coordinates of the icon would depend on the screen resolution and icon placement, so the `width` and `height` values should be adjusted to match the position of the icon:

```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "double_click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 66, "height": 546}}
]
```
